text: The 1994 European Parliament election for the election of the delegation from the Netherlands was held on 9 June 1994. This is the 4th time the elections have been held for the European elections in the Netherlands. Sources for everything below: Data of the 1994 European Election by the Electoral Committee == Numbering of the candidates list == The official order and names of candidate lists: == Candidate lists == === CDA - European People's Party === Below is the candidate list for the Christian Democratic Appeal for the 1994 European Parliament election Elected members are in bold {|class="wikitable vatop" !
